verbose_text: Analysis of K5CreERT2; mTmG mice after one round of CPP induced injury and regeneration revealed Gfp labeling in 24% of I-cells, 16% of binucleated I-cells and 7% of S-cells (XREF_FIG), while after five rounds of CPP, 86% of mononucleated I-cell population, 84% of binucleated I-cells and 87% of S-cells expressed the Gfp lineage mark (XREF_FIG).
